metadata.description: WORLD WAR TWO WAS  NEVER LIKE THIS  Determined to win the war on  their own, the Rifle Brigade  are Britain's top commando  unit—skilled, deadly, and with  no more grip on reality than  absolutely necessary. First,  the team are required on a  job so crucial, so deadly, so  utterly top secret that even  they don't know what it is.  Then, in "Operation Bollock,"  our heroes are set to track  down a famously missing part  of the Fuhrer's anatomy—  determined to wrench the  missing gonad from the hands  of their oldest enemy.
metadata.name: Adventures In The Rifle Brigade
